body.name: USB Charger, Anker Elite Dual Port 24W Wall Charger, PowerPort 2 with PowerIQ and Foldable Plug for iPhone 15/14/13/12/11 Series, iPad Pro/Air 2/Mini 3/Mini 4, Samsung S4/S5, and More

features: Superior Performance by Anker: Become part of the 50 million+ worldwide users who trust our advanced technology for efficient, simultaneous charging of multiple devices, surpassing customer expectations.

Swift and Efficient Charging: Our unique PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies ensure your device charges at its optimum speed, up to 2.4A. Experience rapid charging for a range of devices including iPhones, iPads, and Androids. (Note: Qualcomm Quick Charge is not supported.)

Exceptional Durability and Quality: Crafted with a sturdy textured casing and premium internal components, this charger guarantees reliable performance and longevity, even when faced with scrapes, bumps, and drops.

Compact and Globally Compatible: With its sleek design, foldable plug, and 100-240 volt input, this charger is your ultimate companion for worldwide travel. Its compact size, appealing color, and stylish look make it a must-have travel accessory.

Comprehensive Package and Dedicated Customer Service: The package includes Anker PowerPort 2 Elite, a welcome guide, and our 18-month worry-free warranty. We are dedicated to providing professional, attentive support for customer satisfaction, including prompt replacement of faulty units.
body.description: The World's No. 1 Mobile Charging Brand, In terms of retail sales value in 2020. Data source: Euromonitor International (Shanghai) Co., Ltd., measured in terms of retail sales value in 2020, based on research conducted in 11-2021. Brands are defined as mobile charging brands if more than 75% of their retail sales are contributed by mobile phone charging products. Mobile phone charging products include chargers, wireless chargers, power banks, and charging cables, and these accessories can also be used for other consumer electronics devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elite Series : Our optimized series of chargers. Built super-compact and jam-packed with Anker’s advanced technology to provide full-speed charging to virtually any device. PowerPort 2 Elite Starting a new chapter in USB charging, with faster technology, superior portability, dual USB ports and more. All squeezed into a streamlined, travel-ready wall charger. Give your devices their optimum charge at home or on-the-go. PowerPort 2 Elite is the all-round charger that excels wherever you need it, whenever you need it. High-Speed: With VoltageBoost and PowerIQ Technology Travel Ready: Compact build and foldable plug Durable: Robust casing and premium components

Exclusive Charging Technology Technologies combine to deliver universal, high-speed charging—regardless of device or cable. PowerIQ detects your device’s specific charging requirements while VoltageBoost increases output to compensate for cable resistance. Durable Design Robust, anti-smudge casing and premium components protect against scratches, scrapes, bumps and drops. Travel-Ready Ultra-compact with a foldable plug and equipped with international voltage compatibility. Ideal for travel anywhere in the world. MultiProtect A combination of 10 safety features that work together to provide ultimate protection for your devices, your chargers and most importantly: you.

PowerPort 2 Elite [2-Pack] USB C Charger PowerPort III 20W Cube Anker 511 Charger ( Nano 3 ) Anker 324 Charger ( PowerPort III Duo 40W ) PowerPort Atom III Charging Technology Basic Basic Premium Premium Premium Premium Charging Ports 2 USB A 2 USB C 1 USB C 1 USB C 2 USB C 1 USB C + 1 USB A Total Wattage 24W 20W 20W 30W 40W 60W iPhone Fast Charging - - ✔️ ✔️ ✔️ ✔️ Samsung Fast Charging - - ✔️ ✔️ ✔️ ✔️ Macbook Compatible - - - ✔️ - ✔️ Main Feature Charge 2 Phones Simultaneously A Quick Power Boost If you’re rushed for time USB-C Fast Charger for New Phones, and Tablets Fast Charger for Tablets and iPhone Simultaneous High Speed Charging for Tablets, and Phones Simultaneous High Speed Charging for Laptop, Tablets, and Phones Size/Inch 2.4 x 2.3 x 1.1 1.1 x 1.1 x 1.57 1.23 × 1.25 × 1.3 1.12 x 1.12 x 1.4 2.5 x 2.4 x 1.1 2.7 x 2.7 x 1.1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy i got this!
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of unplugging my kindle to plug in my phone and this charges them both very quickly at the same time. Sturdy, doesn't get warm to the touch, works awesome! Got a second one for the spouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, good value
reviews.reviewText: I like that this block just works and is great for throwing in your travel bag. Don't waste your time on cheapo power blocks that overheat or simply don't work. If you need a portable charger, this is great. Has enough power to charge tablets, phones, pretty much any small day to day device you might have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite charger
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased several of these chargers and spread them around to convenient places so I have them where needed. Great for desk or travel. Fast charge, compact, reliable, durable, and versatile. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for my iPhone 11 and 5th Gen iPad
reviews.reviewText: I purchased new and fast cables to ensure I take advantage of the 12-watt capability per USB port. I tested this out and charged my iPhone 11 and an older iPad together. No issue with charging those at decent speed. I then tried to use this to charge my 22.5-watt INUI power bank on its own. 4 hours later, it only got 20% charge - not impressed with that.I will keep but would only use for my iPhone and iPad. This item looks very sturdy, I like the glowing light when plugged-in, the folding prongs, and the fact that it did not get warm while plugged in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it should, how it should
reviews.reviewText: A friend was lamenting that her iPhone battery seemed to be dying and that it wasn't getting fully charged. I mentioned she might need to switch chargers and, having had good experiences with Anker products in the past, purchased this one for her along with a new USB cable. Sure enough, her iPhone now charges quickly and completely and she no longer talks about needing a new battery.My experience with Anker is that they make good products that are built to last and perform as they should. For something as simple as a USB charger, what more could you want?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Charges fast and easy. Still working today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it
reviews.reviewText: With a teenage son, i have had to buy many charging blocks - especially since most products don't include them anymore. these are by far the best ones that have power, are well-built, and last longer than others. I just need to find a way for them not to get lost. lol.
Compact, feels solid, gives a quick charge, I'd buy it again.
Buen producto. Mi teléfono samsung no lo detecta como carga rápida, pero lo carga en buen tiempo.
Cumple con las especificaciones que menciona! Es un producto de alta calidad!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect travel charger to juice up my smartphones
reviews.reviewText: Perfect travel charger to juice up my smartphones, bluetooth speaker and my Anker Powercore 26800mah battery pack with dual charging port. And is lighter and smaller than I expected. Best replacement to Apple's crappy and puny 5V iphone charger.You can plug this directly on most surge-connectors or just get a conversion plug (for my fellow Indian brethren).

reviews.reviewTitle: Si pueden comprarlo !cómprenlo ya! Es lo mejor del mercado
reviews.reviewText: No hay nada igual, la verdad tenía mis reservas pero al usarlo me di cuenta que es lo mejor qué hay en el mercado, y no soy conformista, no creo que haya algo que lo pueda mejorar. Un producto de alta calidad, es más, se ma hace barato en relativo al ahorro del tiempo de carga.
